title: China launches DRAM chip price probe into Samsung Elec, SK Hynix and Micron
content: SEOUL (Reuters) - China has launched a probe into Samsung Electronics Co Ltd, SK Hynix Inc and Micron Technology Inc, the three semiconductor makers who control the market for DRAM memory chips.
contentSnippet: SEOUL (Reuters) - China has launched a probe into Samsung Electronics Co Ltd, SK Hynix Inc and Micron Technology Inc, the three semiconductor makers who control the market for DRAM memory chips.
